name: Gentle Heroics
description: When a foe initiates combat with an adjacent ally and hits, after combat, roll 1d6 and apply the corresponding condition to that foe for one turn: 1=@{condition}{Exposed}{[Exposed]}, 2=@{condition}{Hexed}{[Hexed]}, 3=@{condition}{Marked}{[Marked]}, 4=@{condition}{Rattled}{[Rattled]}, 5=@{condition}{Vulnerable}{[Vulnerable]}, 6=Roll Again. If this unit rolls three sixes in a row, apply @{condition}{Doomed}{[Doomed]} and stop rolling.
